alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Northwest Plateau; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 02 at 10:25PM MDT until April 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Chuska Mountains, Northwest Plateau, West Central Mountains, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to Midnight MDT Monday Night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust may restrict visibility.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Northwest Plateau; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
